title: The Bully
description: I Know Her Secret…Cat is in so much trouble. She did something bad, and I saw.I’ll keep her secret... for a price.Poor, sweet, timid Cat should never have come to Kingmakers. It’s a place for monsters and killers. People like me.She wandered into the lion’s den and now she’s mine.Mine to play with. Mine to torment. Mine to break...
author: Sophie Lark
